entry.title: 3M Scotch-Weld TL22-10ML - Threadlocker Tl22 in Purple - 0.33 fl. Oz (10 ml) Bottle 7100039217
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Threadlockers
Price: 11.62

[shortdesc]

3M Scotch-Weld Threadlocker, TL22, purple, 0.33 fl. oz. (10 ml)

  • 3M™ Scotch-Weld™ Threadlocker TL22 provides vibration, corrosion, and shock resistance for fasteners in assembled form
  • This purple anaerobic adhesive is dispensed as a single-component, medium viscosity product
  • This low removal torque anaerobic adhesive offers a long open time and cures quickly in the absence of air when parts are assembled.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch-Weld
    Color Purple
    Origin Country United Kingdom
    Product Type Threadlockers
    Volume 0.33 fl. Oz, 10 ml

    Product Information

  • Prevents nuts and bolts from loosening with vibration
  • Fills and seals threads completely to help prevent corrosion, rust, and leaks
  • Eliminates the need for lock washers and other locking components
  • Long open time anaerobic adhesive cures quickly
  • Helps keep production equipment up and running

    • Suggested Application

  • Designed to cure and seal threaded assembles for a wide range of applications
    		•
